error.UpdateEmail: An error occurred while updating the email.
error.ResentEmailVerificationCode: An error occurred while requesting resend the code.
error.NotGetEmailVerified: Could not get data on whether your email has been validated.
error.UpdatePassword: An error occurred while updating the password.

info.SentEmailVerificationCode: We have sent your verification code to your email. Please open the email from verificationemail.com and input the code in the following form.
info.EmailNotVerifiedYet: Your email has not been verified yet. Please open the email from verificationemail.com and input the code in the following form.

success.ResentEmailVerificationCode: We have sent the code again.
